name: Vanguard: Fight For Rudiarius
description:
Set in an alternate future where the Roman empire never fell, Gladiators, known as Vanguard fight for their freedom within vast space arenas for the entertainment of their captors. Pvp dogfighting and player character combat contribute to a career with the aim to some day earn the right to live in peace upon the planet Rudiarius.

Choose your backstory and fighting style, customise your ship and character, set yourself apart from other Vanguard and become the master of your own destiny.

Vanguard: Fight For Rudiarius is an ambitious game currently in Alpha developed by Devclever ltd. As an open production studio we invite you to sign up on our website and join our discord server where your ideas, feedback and contributions will help shape the game.
